Travel & lodging

PNSQC partners with hotels near the venue for discounted rates. The location is easily accessible by public transit and offers nearby dining and attractions.

  • Hotel block available for conference attendees.
  • Transit access via light rail, rideshare, and regional buses.
  • Virtual option for remote attendees with live-stream access.
